methods.description: Constructor that initializes the start index of the group.

expected_testcases.description: Create a new GroupBuilder with a valid positive integer start index, expecting the startIndex field to be set correctly.
Create a new GroupBuilder with a start index of zero, expecting the startIndex field to be set to zero.

methods.description: Adds a GroupBuilder to the list of child group builders.

expected_testcases.description: Add a single GroupBuilder to an empty list, expecting the list to contain one element.
Add multiple GroupBuilders to the list, expecting the list to contain all added elements in the correct order.

methods.description: Builds a Group using the Matcher and group indices, including all child groups.

expected_testcases.description: Build a Group with no child GroupBuilders, expecting a Group with an empty children list.
Build a Group with multiple child GroupBuilders, expecting a Group with a populated children list.
Attempt to build a Group with an invalid group index, expecting an exception or error result.

methods.description: Sets the capturing flag to false, indicating the group is non-capturing.

expected_testcases.description: Set the capturing flag to false, expecting the capturing field to be false.

methods.description: Checks if the group is capturing.

expected_testcases.description: Check the capturing flag when it is true, expecting the method to return true.
Check the capturing flag when it is false, expecting the method to return false.

methods.description: Moves all child GroupBuilders to another GroupBuilder.

expected_testcases.description: Move children to an empty GroupBuilder, expecting the target GroupBuilder to contain all children.
Move children to a GroupBuilder that already has children, expecting the target GroupBuilder to contain all children from both sources.

methods.description: Returns the list of child GroupBuilders.

expected_testcases.description: Get the children list when no children have been added, expecting an empty list.
Get the children list after adding multiple children, expecting a list with the added children.

methods.description: Returns the source string of the group.

expected_testcases.description: Get the source when no source has been set, expecting a null or default value.
Get the source after setting a valid string, expecting the method to return the set string.

methods.description: Sets the source string of the group.

expected_testcases.description: Set a valid non-empty string as the source, expecting the source field to be updated.
Set an empty string as the source, expecting the source field to be updated to an empty string.

methods.description: Returns the start index of the group.

expected_testcases.description: Get the start index after initialization, expecting the method to return the initialized value.

methods.description: Returns the end index of the group.

expected_testcases.description: Get the end index when no end index has been set, expecting a default or initial value.
Get the end index after setting a valid end index, expecting the method to return the set value.

methods.description: Sets the end index of the group.

expected_testcases.description: Set a valid positive integer as the end index, expecting the endIndex field to be updated.
Set zero as the end index, expecting the endIndex field to be updated to zero.

description: Class responsible for building groups of elements, managing their indices, and handling capturing and non-capturing groups.
